Oceaniabreaks.name: David Beckham
Oceaniabreaks.description: Beckham scored 62 goals in 265 appearances over a 9 year period at United

Oceaniabreaks.name: Eduardo Camavinga
Oceaniabreaks.description: The young French international just secured a big move to Real Madrid for 31 million Euros

Oceaniabreaks.name: Kylian Mbappe
Oceaniabreaks.description: The PSG striker was the difference in France winning the 2018 World Cup

Oceaniabreaks.name: Luke Thomas
Oceaniabreaks.description: The Leicester City youngster aged 20 plays Left back

Oceaniabreaks.name: Ciro Immobile
Oceaniabreaks.description: The 31 year old striker from Italy currently plays for Lazio in the Serie A

Oceaniabreaks.name: Patrick Viera
Oceaniabreaks.description: The French CM played for Arsenal for 9 years from 1996-2005, he currently manages Crystal Palace

Oceaniabreaks.name: Chris Wood
Oceaniabreaks.description: The 29 year old Kiwi international often nicknamed Big Dick Chris Wood
